Sweet

So, I started this account because I lost the password to [@Icarus_Vice](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/62815-icarus_vice/) and the associated email address. Now I've got both back and I want my name to get changed on that account to IcarusBen. Firstly, though, this account needs a name change. Can this account be renamed IcarusBenJunkAccount? Once that's done, I'll post again as [@Icarus_Vice](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/62815-icarus_vice/) and ask for that to get changed to IcarusBen.
Each person can only have one forum account, IcarusBen/Icarus\_Vice. Choose which one you want to keep and we will merge them under that name.
Merge the two and name it IcarusBen.
